FuncDef: The display dpfr event-log command displays DPFR logs. The display dpfr event-log command displays DPFR logs. This command is supported only on the CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.
CLIs: display dpfr event-log [ recover | resource-fail | port-status ] slot <slot-id>

ParaDef.Info:
Slot ID.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters without spaces.
